title: How many times?! Please read riot!
body: Listen I have done this more than once and at some point I need someone to do something about this bullshit. It seems like once a week I am booted from match making, because of a client crash. I am losing points for this. I have the most up to date software, I have deleted and downloaded the client over and over. when does it become an issue that I can receive a Dev's help? I have done everything I can think of to make it stop but nothing is working...
